You'll find a reading list here: 
http://www.techjapanese.com/samurai/rec.html which leans more towards 
Japanese samurai and military history, I don't believe any (or at 
least most) of these books were on the 'VERY LONG' list sent out by 
Mr. Thomas.  Most of the books in the list are annotated, and I also 
added a short list at the end of some of the better Japanese books as 
well.

C.E.West
